Andrew Rymer

Full Stack Developer

What I Do

I am a self taught graphic artist, that after 5 years, made a career change to Full Stack Developer. My love of technology and hardware fueled my desire to learn more and ultimatly bring my creative thinking and poblem solving to web development. I love everything from idea conception, planning, and execution to deployment. What continues to inspire me and feed my passion for creating and programming is the quick advancemnt of web technologies. It has the continued learning quality that keeps things exciting and fresh as I add years to my career.

Acquired Skill Set

Over my career I've spent time developing in PHP, SQL, and using frameworks such as Symfony, Laravel, ReactJS, and VueJS. I am highly proficient in HTML, CSS, Javascript, and the use of libraries and tools such as jQuery, Gulp, Webpack, Sass, AWS, and Git. I still maintain a profession working knowledge of Photoshop and Illustrator, and use bash based programs Jpegoptim and PngQuant for image compression and size standardization. I am passionate about the creative process and technology which fuels my desire to continually grow, learn, and challenge myself.
